title: Looking for pre 1920 Cincinnati All Conditions
author: timkb

posts.post_title: Looking for pre 1920 Cincinnati All Conditions
posts.post_content:
I collect all pre-1920 Cincinnati cards and memorabilia.

Especially looking for one of a kinda pieces, cards with writing on them, ticket stubs, books and advertising.



PS - even if your not selling but have something interesting in that category I would love to see scans or pictures. Here for the history! Feel free to PM
